1486.quoteText: webSaver.ca may disclose information from the Site to any third party including law enforcement agencies to protect its rights and property in response to legal process, or in a good faith belief that disclosure is justified or required, or in an emergency situation.
1486.title: personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr: They can share any data in "good faith" that it is required.

1578.quoteText: In addition, webSaver.ca may, in its sole discretion and at any time, discontinue providing or limit access to the Site or any areas of the Site.
1578.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time
tosdr.tldr: Websaver may terminate its service at any time without notice
